item.title: CG & DI色彩管理 Color Management in CG&DI
item.description: * 本测试所有文件和工程可以从 Github @juneleung: Color-Management-in-CG-DI 下载 * All files and projects for this test can be downloaded from: Github @juneleung: Color-Management-in-CG-DI * 本测试使用OCIO (OpenColorIO )和ACES 1.2进行色彩管理 * This test uses OCIO (OpenColorIO ) and ACES 1.2 for color management * 本测试使用的色卡为 (ITU-R_BT.709_ColorChecker2014.exr ), 其他色卡可以从 Github @colour-science: colour-nuke 下载。 * The Macbeth ColorChecker used in this test is (ITU-R_BT.709_ColorChecker2014.exr ), other ColorCheckers can be downloaded from Github @colour-science: colour-nuke .

item.title: Davinci Resolve API
item.description: API Updated as of 17 May 2023 <!DOCTYPE html> Resolve Fusion() –> Fusion % Returns the Fusion object. Starting point for Fusion scripts. GetMediaStorage() –> MediaStorage % Returns the media storage object to query and act on media locations. GetProjectManager() –> ProjectManager % Returns the project manager object for currently open database. OpenPage(pageName) –> Bool % Switches to indicated page in DaVinci Resolve. Input can be one of (“media”, “cut”, “edit”, “fusion”, “color”, “fairlight”, “deliver”).
